name: VR Simulcasters
imageDescription: A young woman with dark curly hair in a pink shirt stands before a tropical setting, with a holographic blue figure of a person gesturing beside her.

name: The Presence
ability: You may add 1 & move 2 delegates during a fund-raise op.
future: TW COMMANDER FUTURE: Reqs = Contribute 8+ & more than any opponent to isototal. Effects = Your delegates count as 2 votes, 9 VP.
imageDescription: A man embraces a glowing blue holographic humanoid figure, symbolizing the intimate connection between humans and their digital presence.

name: Neural Pilots
imageDescription: A futuristic spaceplane with twin engines flies through an orange-tinted sky, representing brain-integrated spacecraft piloting technology.

name: Shipbrain
ability: You may cargo transfer between your non-ET Home Bernal and LEO. Cannot enter Aerobrake Hazards.
future: WARDEN STAR-SHOT FUTURE: Reqs = Ad astra with TW Thruster and Promoted Freighter. Effect = Freighter/Mobile Factories receive +1 thrust, 7 VP.
imageDescription: A stylized human skull with cybernetic spine attachments floats against a purple background, representing humans who have merged with their spacecraft.

name: Boston Hexapods
imageDescription: A woman in a white spacesuit examines a holographic display showing a six-legged robotic walker design, demonstrating hexapod mobility technology.

name: Zombie Wanderers
ability: As an Op, Decom. to remove Busted disk and place Claim on a Colocated Site of Size 2+.
future: AVATAR FUTURE: Reqs = This card at Promoted Bernal with Neptune zone Dirtside, Active Law = Individuality. Effects = immune to Felonies, 9 VP.
imageDescription: A pale woman with white hair wearing protective goggles stands before a computer display showing 'data transfer', representing humans with 3D-printed organ scaffolding.

name: Lava Lamp Evangelists
imageDescription: A bearded man wearing a headband and dark clothing with glowing orange patterns resembling lava lamp fluid, promoting local nanite-based energy generation.

name: Sunburn League
ability: You may ignore the Solar-Power icon on 1 Colocated card.
future: NANITE GOO FUTURE: Reqs = This card at your Colonized Push Factory. Effects = 1 free implant op at this Site, 11 VP.
imageDescription: A figure with sun-damaged, mottled skin adjusts their collar, representing humans adapted to survive high radiation environments through nanite technology.

name: Clone Entrepreneurs
imageDescription: Two identical fetuses float in mirrored artificial wombs surrounded by blue energy, representing cloning technology promising immortality.

name: Death Insurers
ability: You may implant the parenthood augmentation into your spaceborn.
future: VATS FUTURE: Reqs = Your Colonist with the life-support augmentation has a wunderkind. Effects = 9 VP.
imageDescription: A man with cybernetic implants on his head and temples closes his eyes peacefully, representing advanced hibernation jar technology for brain preservation.

name: Prehensilists
imageDescription: A luminous blue teardrop shape floats among tentacle-like appendages, representing humans adapted for weightless environments with prehensile capabilities.

name: Transplaneteers
ability: You may boost contracts to your Home Bernal without doubling Boost cost.
future: INTERSTELLAR EXPLORATION FUTURE: Reqs = this card plus augmented Colonist at EM Sunlens. Effects = immediate research grant at no cost, 14 VP.
imageDescription: A blue-green terraformed planet floats in the darkness of space, representing spaceborn humans adapted to survive radiation and low gravity but unable to live at 1 gee.

name: Teleoperators
imageDescription: A man wearing VR goggles watches a white robot holding a pink flower, demonstrating remote robonaut operation at distances up to a light minute away.

name: Drone Queen
future: LIC SCAN FUTURE: Reqs = This card and another Promoted Colonist at your Synodic Comet Factory. Effects = If you produce any isotopes as part of a site refuel operation, you may move 1 of them to your Bank, 9 VP.
imageDescription: A woman's face is overlaid with a hierarchical organizational chart, representing neurological control of remote drones merging human brains with machine capabilities.

name: Transhuman Activists
imageDescription: Diverse human figures hold hands around planet Earth, representing activists who believe civilization's future lies with those adapted to space conditions.

name: Jarhead Insurgents
ability: You may commit Felonies against players with no spaceborn.
future: EXODUS FUTURE: Reqs = Ad astra with TW Thruster and your Promoted Bernal. Effects = Casus belli, 12 VP.
imageDescription: A futuristic identification device with fingerprint scanner, holographic display, and biometric readers floats against a blue background.

name: Exoskeletalists
imageDescription: A person wearing a powered exoskeleton walks through a red rocky canyon landscape, demonstrating wearable limb technology suitable for space conditions.

name: Space Jockeys
ability: Constructing Space Elevators is a free action.
future: ISOTOPE CARTEL FUTURE: Reqs = This card and 15 isotope at your Promoted Anchored Bernal. Effects = Isotope exchange rate is now 12 Aqua for all players. Endgame Effect: 9 VP.
imageDescription: A sleek black spacecraft with glowing orange engines flies through blue skies, representing pilots who harness gravity and high thrust to maintain links between gravity wells.

name: Gabonese Mining Consortium
imageDescription: A child sits on the ground eating a hamburger with mining equipment and supplies nearby, representing a space mining operation focused on post-scarcity through raw materials.

name: Bubbleopolis
ability: Your Spacecraft may land or liftoff sites with Size = net thrust.
future: QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT FUTURE: Reqs = This card at Haumea with Operational X reactor. Effects = 1 reroll per Crash Hazard Roll, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A transparent domed city floats above a barren planetary surface under a starry sky, depicting Bubbleopolis, a libertarian space colony from the 'Quantum Vibe' sci-fi comics.
